column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Objective is clear. We are ready to move on to the extract LZ. Over.
Alpha One to Bravo One. Requesting extraction. Over.
Team Alpha, this is Bravo. Insert LZ in sight. Get ready for fastroping. Out.
Air Bravo here. Copy that Alpha, we're on our way. Out.
This is Bravo, we're almost overhead. Get ready for extraction. Over.
Takeoff. We're going home, you heroes. Bravo out.
Roger that, Alpha. The Air Force liasion officer here sends his thanks. Stay stealthy and healthy. Papa Bear out.
Alpha, nice going. Welcome back. Your mission is complete. Out.
